string.text: Welcome to the rating system - Sigerous Top. You need to register. Enter your username. Write in Latin or Cyrillic. Of characters allowed only point. Limit: 10 characters.
Username accepted. Now enter the name of the city where you are. Write in Latin or Cyrillic. Limit: 12 characters.
Your data is successfully registered in the ranking Sigerous Top. Enjoy the game!
You are excluded from Sigerous Top. For the use of cheats. To return to the status quo - you must load the previously saved.

You are temporarily excluded from Sigerous Top. Difficulty level chosen at the beginning of the new game does not match your teschemu level of complexity. Sign in options of the game and to restore the complexity.
When a series of correct answers of 5 or more points: you get a tip on a cache, as well as an additional amount of money.
Questions have been exhausted. Continuation of the game impossible.
